0: assert siegfried(5, "What is happening with the weather") == "Vat is happening viz ze veater"
assert siegfried(5, "Cinderella can sing well") == "Sinderella cun sink vell"
assert siegfried(5, "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog") == "Ze kwik brown foks jumps over ze lazy dog"
assert siegfried(5, "the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog") == "ze quick brown fox jumps uver ze lazy dog"
assert siegfried(5, "Whispering wind through the trees") == "Vispering vin zroug ze trees"
assert siegfried(5, "chocolate is cool") == "chocolate is kul"
assert siegfried(5, "She is singing and dancing") == "She is sinkink und dancink"
assert siegfried(5, "He won a scholarship after completing his studies") == "He von un scholarschip afte completing his studies"
1: assert siegfried(5, "We are waiting for you") == "Ve are vaitink for u"
assert siegfried(1, "Circle the center") == "Sirkle the senter"
assert siegfried("Week 4", "What a wonderful world") == "Vat a vonderful vorld"
assert siegfried(3, "She'll come soon") == "She'll kom so"
assert siegfried("Week 3", "See you there") == "Se yu zere"
assert siegfried("Week 5", "I am going to smoke") == "I un gink to schmoke"
assert siegfried(4, "What is your name?") == "Vat is your name?"
2: assert siegfried(2, "Philosophy is fascinating") == "Filozofy is fascinating"
assert siegfried(1, "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog") == "Ze quick brown fox jumps over ze lazy dog"
assert siegfried(3, "I am feeling fine") == "I am fealing fine"
assert siegfried(3, "Look at the balloon") == "Lok at ze baloon"
assert siegfried(2, "Philosophy is a great subject") == "Filosofy is a great subject"
assert siegfried(1, "Cinderella was not here") == "Sinderella vas not here"
assert siegfried(4, "Wrestling with whips and chains") == "Restling viz vips and chains"
assert siegfried(1, "The woman who wrote") == "Ze voman vho rote"
3: assert siegfried(1, "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog") == "Ze quick brown fox jumps over ze lazy dog"
assert siegfried(3, "I am feeling fine") == "I am fealing fine"
assert siegfried(3, "Feeling great, I see the committee") == "Feeling great, I se ze komitee"
